articles.title: Mizoram Assembly Election 2018: BJP looks to make its mark in the state with highest concentration of tribals
articles.author: FP Politics
articles.description: Like the Assam election in 2016, the Mizoram election in 2018 may see illegal immigration from neighbouring countries become an important issue. The post Mizoram Assembly Election 2018: BJP looks to make its mark in the state with highest concentration of tri…

articles.title: 7,59,519 Voters In Mizoram After Revision Of Electoral Roll
articles.description: The total number of electorates in Mizoram after the completion of the summary revision of voters list is 7,59,519 as per the electoral roll published by the state election department Monday.

articles.title: Live updates: Election Commission to announce Assembly poll dates for Meghalaya, Tripura, Nagaland
articles.author: Express Web Desk
articles.description: Election Commission 2018 Assembly polls live updates: The Election Commission of India is expected to announce the schedule for elections to three states today. Of the eight states going to polls this year, the Houses of Meghalaya, Tripura and Nagaland expire…

articles.title: Saffron, saffron everywhere: How India's political map changes after the NDA's clean-sweep in the northeast
articles.description: India's northeast is now awash in saffron - the only exception being Mizoram. That could change later this year, when Aizawl gets a new assembly ahead of next year's general election.

articles.title: Rajnath Singh reviews North East security situation
articles.author: Express News Service
articles.description: The Home Ministry will provide central forces for the elections once the Election Commission announces the poll dates, officials said.

articles.title: BJP no threat to Congress in Mizoram: CM Lal Thanhawla
articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.description: Thanhawla was in Delhi for the ‘Magnetic Mizoram Roadshow’, a curtain raiser for the first investors’ summit to be held in Aizawl in April, to attract investors to the north-eastern state.

articles.title: Bru Repatriation Unlikely To Begin As Per Schedule In March: Official
articles.description: Repatriation of over 5,000 Bru families from Tripura is not likely to take off as scheduled from this month, as the refugees rejected a central government financial assistance proposal, a senior state home department official today said.

articles.title: Election Commission to announce poll dates for Meghalaya, Nagaland, Tripura today
articles.author: Express Web Desk
articles.description: Election Commission to announce poll dates today: The three northeast states are among eight in the country that go to polls in 2018. The Assembly term of Meghalaya, Nagaland, and Tripura end on March 6, March 13 and March 14 respectively.

articles.title: Poll Dates For Meghalaya, Tripura And Nagaland To Be Announced Today
articles.description: Poll dates for the northeastern states of Meghalaya, Tripura and Nagaland will be announced by the Election Commission this afternoon.

articles.title: EC announces poll dates for Tripura, Meghalaya, Naga
articles.author: ET Online
articles.description: EC announces poll dates for Tripura, Meghalaya, NagaThe term of the Meghalaya, Nagaland and Tripura legislative assemblies is ending on March 6, March 13 and March 14 respectively.

articles.title: Historic verdict, BJP’s footprint increasing with every election: Amit Shah
articles.author: Gyan Varma
articles.description: Amit Shah says the elections result is a message from the people in favour of Narendra Modi and politics of development initiated by the NDA government

articles.title: BJP will win Karnataka election, form government: Javadekar
articles.author: PTI
articles.description: Union minister Prakash Javadekar today said the BJP would win the upcoming Karnataka Assembly polls and form the next government in the state. “I am the party in-charge for Karnataka. We will win...

articles.title: BJP Will Win Karnataka Election, Form Government: Prakash Javadekar
articles.description: Union minister Prakash Javadekar Saturday said the BJP would win the upcoming Karnataka Assembly polls and form the next government in the state.

articles.title: BJP will win Karnataka election, form govt: Javadekar
articles.author: PTI
articles.description: BJP will win Karnataka election, form govt: Javadekar"The situation in the country will be like the BJP everywhere and the Congress nowhere," the Union human resources development minister said.

articles.title: Assembly election 2018 dates announced LIVE updates: Tripura to vote on 18 Feb, Meghalaya, Nagaland on 27 Feb; results for all states on 3 March
articles.author: FP Politics
articles.description: The Election Commission of India officially ushered in the first elections of 2018 on Thursday and announced the election dates for three northeastern states — Meghalaya, Tripura and Nagaland. The post Assembly election 2018 dates announced LIVE updates: Trip…

articles.title: Politics in 2018: Here is a list of states that go to polls this year
articles.author: Express Web Desk
articles.description: Eight states go to election in 2018. They include BJP strongholds of Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan and Chhattisgarh,

articles.title: Meghalaya election results: Ahmed Patel, Kamal Nath rush to Shillong to explore alliance options
articles.author: PTI
articles.description: With election trends projecting that Congress could emerge as the single-largest party in Meghalaya,  Ahmed Patel and Kamal Nath have left for Shillong for possible tie-ups for govt formation

articles.title: Congress rushes top leaders to Meghalaya to explore govt formation possibilities
articles.description: With election trends projecting that the Congress could emerge as the single-largest party in Meghalaya, the party today rushed two senior leaders to the northeastern state to explore possibilities of forming a government.
